Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory40.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Aha... Robots playing characters. So weird, but so interesting!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I like their lines. Feels like ancient characters who have revived in modern times.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "...Ahh, I wonder what's going to happen next!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Sorry, that's all I've made so far.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Who's there?", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Did I scare you? My name's Selena. I'm the author.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Pardon me, but I was really glad to hear your feedback.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Huh? You made this theater play?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "It's a bit embarrassing... And still not good enough.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'But this is indeed my work. I created it, so I must take own up to it!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "But you don't look much older than me... Very impressive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'How kind of you. No need to keep flattering me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Come on, let's talk about the play!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'It\'s an adaptation of the early human theater play "The Tempest" in the database. Due to the lack of data, I could only restore part of it...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Oh! I searched up that play in the database! Even the brief introduction already got me...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'They keep talking as if nothing mattered anymore.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: '...Just come to me whenever you need an illustration, Selena.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "That's great! I was so worried about my theater scenery. I don't know how to create the setup I want.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'With your illustrations, I can design my stage properly!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Yep, glad I can help!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: '—Attention to all guests. This center will be closing soon. Please head toward the exit—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "It's already so late...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Oh? I didn't notice at all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "That means we have a great vibe. We've talked about so much stuff! I learned a lot today.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I've got to go. In the end, your theater play was the only thing I experienced today, haha.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Sorry... I was just too happy.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'But you too, you were so focused and forget the time, Ayla!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Well, let's keep in touch, shall we?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Of course!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: 'Many days passed. And Ayla lost count.'}
{3: 'But she enjoyed every single day because she found her soul mate of similar age.'}
{3: 'Ayla wanted to share everything with Selena immediately: knowledge of art, creativity, or simply anything they both were interested in.'}
{3: 'But she has her own melancholy too.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Meka', 3: "Ayla, it's mail from her again!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Ma'am? Oh, I'll be right there!", 4: '1'}
{3: '... (Footsteps)'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Aha, I knew it. Selena always draws a little bear in the beginning.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "Ayla, I looked up your new friend and she's really good.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Of course Selena is good!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "...What did you find though, ma'am?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'I saw her name earlier in the city exhibition hall. Out of curiosity, I asked a friend about her.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'My friend was the manager of the art show. She told me Selena was their most promising prospect.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'What? What does she mean by... prospect?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'Hmm... Renowned, maybe.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'She has great potentials, and her skills are developing fast.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "I saw her works... It's hard to imagine they were created by a teenager.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "...Yeah. But she's Selena so I'm not surprised at all...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "I see. You probably haven't realized, because you two are good friends.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "But to us, she'll probably shine like a star in the future.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '...Of course. Selena will become famous, without a doubt...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "Hopefully. If that's the case, I'll be witnessing the growth of a great artist.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "Oh, sorry, Ayla. I hope I haven't wasted too much of your time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "I'll get going. Not all the students are like you, Ayla. They need to be disciplined...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mail Content', 3: "Sorry I couldn't talk to you in person, Ayla. I've just been too busy recently!"}
{2: 'Mail Content', 3: 'Remember what I told you before? My theater play will be displayed in the exhibition!'}
{2: 'Mail Content', 3: 'I thought I just needed to give them the scripts. Turned out there was more work to do. Supervising, checking... Such a hassle.'}
{2: 'Mail Content', 3: 'Oh, right. By saying "them", I mean the World Government Association of Art of Babylonia. They\'re professionals!'}
{2: 'Mail Content', 3: 'By the way, I met many Constructs as well!'}
{2: 'Mail Content', 3: "They were no different from humans! I couldn't imagine their bodies were made of machines."}
{2: 'Mail Content', 3: "Without your help, I couldn't have done this."}
{2: 'Mail Content', 3: "I've always been very thankful. But I just couldn't tell you in person..."}
{2: 'Mail Content', 3: 'Do you want to display your artwork, Ayla?'}
{2: 'Mail Content', 3: 'I saw the works of many adults. Yours are as good as theirs, if not better.'}
{2: 'Mail Content', 3: "Seriously, would you consider it? It'll probably benefit you too!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "I see. She's been busy indeed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'World Government Association of Art, huh... There must be a lot of great creators. If I can learn from them...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hmm, it's decided then!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Selena, I promise I'll catch up! I won't lose to you!", 4: '1'}
